name: commando days adventures
description:
Commando Days Adventures

Version: 1.0

This game is about the adventures of commando warriors and at the first level will run to get the bag after getting the bag to the second level and here begin the adventure with the game with other soldiers to face the king with vehicles that must be eradicated and head to victory with all obstacles that must be faced. Have a nice play

Control the game with the "space bar" to jump and control and press "Ctrl" to shoot and to control the button with the one button to jump and the second button to shoot, to start the game you can press "enter" or click directly and to stop the game press "Esc" or start again press "Esc" again
